quoteText: If you wish to cancel your account, or request that we no longer use your information to provide you with our services, or request that we no longer maintain your information, please contact us at info@reputation.com.
title: You can delete your content from this service

tosdr.case: You can delete your content from this service
tosdr.tldr: Reputation.com service cannot be canceled online, but via email with a guaranteed response time.
